title: Watch, Bangladesh vs India: Rishabh Pant’s thrilling 93-run counterattack in Dhaka
content: 𝗕𝗹𝗶𝗻𝗸 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝘆𝗼𝘂'𝗹𝗹 𝗺𝗶𝘀𝘀 𝗶𝘁 🔥A Pant-astic knock of 93 in just 104 balls from @RishabhPant17 🤯On a scale of 1️⃣-1️⃣0️⃣, how impressed were you with the #RP17's show? 🤩💥#RishabhPant #BANvIND #SonySportsNetwork pic.twitter.com/aaQHZR7mhy— Sony Sports Network (@SonySportsNetwk) December 23, 2022
author: Scroll Staff
